sqlMap.statement:
SELECT DLY.GLBL_CMPY_CD , DLY.SVC_TASK_DLY_RPT_PK , DLY.CRAT_DT , DLY.SNAP_SHOT_DT_TM_TS , DLY.ORG_LAYER_NUM , DLY.FIRST_ORG_CD , DLY.FIRST_ORG_NM , DLY.SCD_ORG_CD , DLY.SCD_ORG_NM , DLY.THIRD_ORG_CD , DLY.THIRD_ORG_NM , DLY.FRTH_ORG_CD , DLY.FRTH_ORG_NM , DLY.FIFTH_ORG_CD , DLY.FIFTH_ORG_NM , DLY.SIXTH_ORG_CD , DLY.SIXTH_ORG_NM , DLY.SVNTH_ORG_CD , DLY.SVNTH_ORG_NM , DLY.EIGHTH_ORG_CD , DLY.EIGHTH_ORG_NM , DLY.NINTH_ORG_CD , DLY.NINTH_ORG_NM , DLY.TENTH_ORG_CD , DLY.TENTH_ORG_NM , DLY.ELVTH_ORG_CD , DLY.ELVTH_ORG_NM , DLY.TOT_IN_PROC_TASK_CNT , DLY.PRT_WAIT_TASK_CNT , DLY.SPCL_WAIT_TASK_CNT , DLY.OTH_OPEN_TASK_CNT , DLY.CUST_TASK_CNT , DLY.ESCL_TASK_CNT , DLY.CRAT_TASK_CNT , DLY.CRAT_TASK_PER_TECH_RATE , DLY.AFT_HOUR_TASK_CNT , DLY.AFT_HOUR_TASK_PER_TECH_RATE , DLY.CLO_TASK_CNT , DLY.CLO_TASK_PER_TECH_RATE , DLY.PRT_FAIL_CNT , DLY.POST_ENTRY_TASK_CNT , DLY.AVAL_TECH_CNT , DLY.RSP_TM_CUST_TASK_RATE , DLY.RSP_TM_ALL_TASK_RATE , DLY.AFT_HOUR_AVAL_TECH_CNT , DLY.CUST_TASK_TOT_RSP_AOT , DLY.CLO_CUST_TASK_CNT , DLY.ALL_TASK_TOT_RSP_AOT , DLY.CLO_ALL_TASK_CNT , DLY.SVC_TASK_LTST_FLG FROM SVC_TASK_DLY_RPT DLY WHERE DLY.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND DLY.CRAT_DT <= #cratDt#
AND DLY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY EZINTIME ASC
SELECT HIST.GLBL_CMPY_CD , HIST.SVC_TASK_HIST_RPT_PK FROM SVC_TASK_HIST_RPT HIST WHERE HIST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND HIST.CRAT_DT <= #cratDt# AND HIST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY EZINTIME ASC
